ACCOUNT_CONFIRMED_SUCCESSFULLY: You have completed your account registration successfully
PERSONA_ADDRESS_CREATED: In order to start creating your identity, the fallowing Persona address was associated with your account {{address}}
REMEMBER_ONLY_FOR_CURRENT_INSTANCE: Your pass phrase will be saved until you close/refresh the current tab
EDIT_ATTRIBUTE_WARNING: Updating your {{ value }} will invalidate it and all it's associated attributes
1_LOWER_CASE: Must contain at least 1 lowercase alphabetical character;
1_UPPER_CASE: Must contain at least 1 uppercase alphabetical character;
1_NUMERIC: Must contain at least 1 numeric character;
1_SPECIAL: Must contain at least 1 special character;
EXISTING_ATTRIBUTE: At least one attribute of type {{ value }} has been already created
INCLUDES_ATTRIBUTES_DESCRIPTION: This document will be used to verify the fallowing attributes
CONFIRM_WAIT: Confirming account. This may take a while ...
ADDRESS_PASSPHRASE_CONTROL: This address is controlled by the following pass phrase
DONT_FORGET_PASSPHRASE: We CANNOT recover this pass phrase! It is your responsibility to keep it safe and not forget it.
NO_PASSPHRASE_NO_ADDRESS: If you are unable to provide this pass phrase, all data associated with your address will be un-accessible
SECURE_DRIVE: Save your pass phrase on a secure drive
SEND_TO_FRIENDS: Send pieces of it to entrusted people, family members, friends
ATTRIBUTES_COMPLETED: Completed {{current}} out of {{ total }} possible attributes
ATTRIBUTE_ABOUT_TO_EXPIRE: {{attribute}} is about to expire in {{ days }} days
PROVIDE_PASSPHRASE_TO_DECRYPT: Provide pass phrase to decrypt your information
YOUR_THE_OWNER: You're the owner of your information. Every attribute you add is encrypted and only you can access it
IN_ORDER_TO_VIEW_INFORMATION_PLEASE_DECR: In order to view your attribute you need to provide your passphrase
PROVIDE_LOCATION_TO_FIEND_BEST_NOTARIES: In order to view the nearest Persona Notaries, please provide your location
SUBMIT_NOTORIZATION_CONFIRMATION: You are about to create a notarization request to {{ firstName }} {{ lastName }}, {{ address }} for validation your {{ type }}. Proceed?
NO_REQUESTS_CREATED_YET: No identity use requests created yet
NAME: Name
SPECIFY_REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTES: Please specify all the required attributes Persona users need to have validated in order to use this service
SERVICE_REQUIRES_SOME_ATTRIBUTES_THAT_AR: This service requires some identity attributes that are unavailbe or inactive
